items.sentence: Why do you always want to do things the hard way?
Why do you have such a negative approach to life?
Why do you keep looking in your rear-view mirror?
It isn\'t easy to write a love letter in English.
I don\'t think Tom wants to be my friend anymore.
I\'m glad I have a friend like you to confide in.
I\'m going to do something by myself for a while.
I\'m on my way to visit a friend in the hospital.
Tom encouraged Mary to learn how to speak French.
Tom enlisted in the army when he was 18 year old.
